summary: Completed testing of P0 fixes for SESI website. All 5 P0 issues verified: 1) Members Directory with expandable profiles and certificate download working 2) Homepage committee layout correct (President->Office Bearers->EC Members) 3) Registration page shows only Life Member 4) Amber color scheme applied 5) Admin Committee photo upload working. Fixed critical bug: certificate/image downloads were returning HTML due to ingress routing - changed static files mount from /uploads to /api/uploads.

issues: Some existing members show 'Associate Member' as membership_type - this is historical data in database, not a bug. New registrations will only have 'Life Member' option.

action_items: OPTIONAL: Run database migration to update existing 'Associate Member' records to 'Life Member' if business requires
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Changed static files mount from /uploads to /api/uploads for proper ingress routing
/app/frontend/src/pages/MembersDirectory.js - Updated certificate URL to use /api prefix
/app/frontend/src/pages/Gallery.js - Updated image URLs to use /api prefix
/app/frontend/src/pages/Home.js - Updated profile image URLs to use /api prefix
/app/frontend/src/pages/ExecutiveCommittee.js - Added BACKEND_URL and updated profile image URLs
/app/frontend/src/admin/ManageCommittee.js - Updated profile image URLs to use /api prefix
/app/frontend/src/admin/ManageGallery.js - Updated image URLs to use /api prefix
/app/tests/test_public_api.py - Added tests for members directory fields and certificate_path
seed_data_creation: Using existing seeded data: 5 members, 16 committee members
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 issues fixed and verified. Static file serving now uses /api/uploads path for proper Kubernetes ingress routing. Certificate downloads work correctly. Registration page only shows Life Member option. Homepage committee layout is President at top, office bearers below, EC members in horizontal row.

features_tested.members_directory_page: PASS - /members page loads with search and state filter
features_tested.member_profile_expansion: PASS - Clicking member row expands profile with details
features_tested.certificate_download: PASS - Download button visible, URL correct (/api/uploads/...), returns PDF
features_tested.homepage_committee_layout: PASS - President at top, 3 office bearers below, 12 EC members in horizontal row
features_tested.registration_life_member_only: PASS - Only 'Life Member' radio option shown, no 'Associate Member'
features_tested.color_scheme_amber: PASS - Using amber-700/amber-800 colors instead of bright orange
features_tested.admin_committee_photo_upload: PASS - Photo upload input present in Add/Edit Committee form
features_tested.backend_api_members: PASS - /api/public/members returns all required fields including certificate_path

mocked_apis.email_notifications: Email sending is MOCKED (printed to console)
